title: Apple's Asia suppliers hit by MicroLED screen reports
text:
Apple's Asia suppliers hit by MicroLED screen reports Monday, March 19, 2018 - 01:15 
Apple is developing its own MicroLED device displays and has made small numbers of the screens for testing, according to media reports sending shares in its Asian suppliers lower. Ciara Lee reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Apple is developing its own MicroLED device displays and has made small numbers of the screens for testing, according to media reports sending shares in its Asian suppliers lower.
